definitions.definition: The form of a thing, as depending on the relative placement of the parts of a thing's shape .
The relative positions of a set of things; the way things are arranged or put together ;

subdefinitions.definition: The aspect of the planets ; the face of the horoscope , according to the relative positions of the planets at any time.

definitions.definition: The arrangement of electrons in an atom , molecule , or other physical structure like a crystal.
A finite set of points and lines (and sometimes planes), generally with equal numbers of points per line and equal numbers of lines per point.
The way a computing environment ( physical or software ) is set up or customized to the needs of its users.
The process of customizing a computing environment in this way.

main_definition: The form of a thing, as depending on the relative placement of the parts of a thing's shape .
secondary_definitions: The relative positions of a set of things; the way things are arranged or put together ;
( countable , physics , chemistry ) The arrangement of electrons in an atom , molecule , or other physical structure like a crystal.
( countable , algebra ) A finite set of points and lines (and sometimes planes), generally with equal numbers of points per line and equal numbers of lines per point.
( countable , computing ) The way a computing environment ( physical or software ) is set up or customized to the needs of its users.
( uncountable , computing ) The process of customizing a computing environment in this way.
